dataSetInformation.common:synonyms: 3,4-Ethylenedioxythiophene; EDOT monomer; Poly(3,4-ethylenedioxythiophene) precursor; PEDOT monomer
3,4-Ethylenedioxythiophene; EDOT monomer; Poly(3,4-ethylenedioxythiophene) precursor; PEDOT monomer
dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: EDOT (3,4-ethylenedioxythiophene) refers to a specific chemical compound that is used as a monomer in the production of conducting polymers. The description for EDOT as a product flow includes its high purity level, its usage as a precursor for the synthesis of poly(3,4-ethylenedioxythiophene) (PEDOT), the standard synthesis route involving chemical oxidation or electrochemical polymerization, and its common form as a liquid for processing. EDOT is typically available for industrial usage and is sold as a specialty chemical, often found 'at plant' for producers or 'to consumer' for end-users in the specialty chemicals market.
EDOT（3,4-乙烯基二氧噻吩）是一种特定的化学化合物，用作导电聚合物生产中的单体。EDOT作为产品流的描述包括其高纯度水平，用作合成聚（3,4-乙烯基二氧噻吩）（PEDOT）的前体，标准合成路线包括化学氧化或电化学聚合，以及其通常作为流体加工的常见形态。EDOT通常用于工业用途，并作为一种专门的化学品出售，经常在专业化学品市场中找到'在生产厂'供应商或'向消费者'的最终用户。
